title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Maple Sally Road, North Carolina
content:
Photo submitted by Tyler, “Photo of our friend Mike riding the famous Maple Sally gravel road loop in Lenoir, NC. It’s about 33 miles with around 3,000 feet of climbing, and tons of twisty, fast, and fun gravel roads to explore. And the occasional peak through the trees at the Blue Ridge Mountains.” We always

author: Kristi Benedict
